user.description: Before continuing, please confirm that you have deleted any old entries that were added via the 'seplos_bms_ha' addon. Leaving old entries may cause sensor naming conflicts with the new version. Any data stored in the old sensors should be adopted by the new addon automatically.

data.confirm: Please confirm you have deleted any old entries that were added via the 'seplos_bms_ha' addon before continuing!

bms_type.description: Please select your BMS Version from the list below. If your BMS is not listed, it is currently not supported. You can request support on our GitHub repository.

connector_port.description: Please enter the connection port for your BMS. For example, use '/dev/ttyUSB0' for local serial connections. ESPHome and Bluetooth connection ports may be available in the future.

sensor_prefix.description: Please enter your battery address and desired sensor naming prefix. All sensors will automatically include the battery address as part of their names and cannot be removed.

data.battery_address: Please enter your battery pack address
data.sensor_prefix: Please enter your desired sensor prefix
